title: Nationals stun experts with Game 5 win in L.A.
text:
The Washington Nationals continue to make believers out of their skeptics.

All four experts and former big leaguers on Fox Sports picked the Los Angeles Dodgers to beat the Washington Nationals in the National League Division Series.

That quartet was Alex Rodriguez, Frank Thomas, Dontrelle Willis, and David Ortiz.

The Nationals were 3-4 against the Dodgers in regular-season play this year but won the series 3-2 Wednesday night. Washington won the wild-card game over the Milwaukee Brewers, who had won the season series with the Nationals 4-2.

Washington will now play Game 1 of the NLCS on Friday at the St. Louis Cardinals, with the first pitch at 8:08 p.m. ET. The Cardinals won five of seven games this year against their Nationals.
